entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:38 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or snow late this evening then to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
